Package butka.tarathep.lab4

Class SicBoV2

java.lang.Object
butka.tarathep.lab4.SicBoV2
public class SicBoV2 extends Object
The program ask which game user want to play. How do they want to bet, then how much do they win.

When this process end, SicBoV2 will ask the user if they want to keep playing.

If a user input "a" or "A" the game will start again. If user input anything else, the game will stop.
Version:
1.0 5/1/2023
Author:
Tarathep Butka

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)

      running method are :

      • playGame();

      • dicision();

    • getChoice

      public static void getChoice()
      This method add choice from user.
      Parameters:
      choice - is integer to choose type of game.

    • playGame

      public static void playGame()
      This method add what user bet and check condition and display user win or lose.

      Example user bet is h,H,l,L,1,2,3,4,5,6.
      Parameters:
      types - is a string to choose type you bet and find game result.
      num - is a integer to find result of game.

    • dicision

      public static void dicision()
      This method is ask if user want to play again or end game.

      If user want to play again press a,A.

      If user want to end press the other keys.
      Parameters:
      dicisions - is a string to play game again or exit game.
